app.name: WiingPong
app.short_description: Pong game for Nintendo Wii with debug tools
app.long_description:
A classic Pong game for Nintendo Wii with Wiimote controls and optional debug view.
Controls: - A Button: Move paddle up - B Button: Move paddle down - A + B (hold 4 seconds): Toggle debug view - HOME Button: Exit game
Features: - Audio feedback on TV and Wiimote speakers - AI opponent - Visual debug overlay with progress indicator - Wiimote button state monitoring - 4-second hold protection against accidental activation
Debug view shows real-time button states, WPAD status, and bit-level input visualization for troubleshooting connectivity issues. Activation requires deliberately holding A+B for 4 seconds with visual progress feedback.
